alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Loup; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 2:55PM CDT until May 12 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Loup County in north central Nebraska... Garfield County in north central Nebraska... Southwestern Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 255 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Hartsuff State Park, or 10 miles north of Ord, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Ericson, Deverre, Sunfish Lake and Gables. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Nebraska.
